column2: ggplot(aes(x=jaar,y=sum/60,group=site)) + geom_point(aes(colour=site)) + geom_line(aes(colour=site)) + theme_bw() + theme(text = element_text(size = 12, family = "serif"), axis.text.x = element_text(angle=45, hjust = 0.5, vjust = 0.5, family = "serif"), strip.background = element_rect(colour = "black", fill = "white"), legend.position = "bottom") + ylab("Totale duur aangepast spuibeheer (uren)")
